item.title: mov inc.
item.description:
Rooted in digital marketing consulting, we have expanded our business scope to include ‘Inbound Tourism Business’ and ‘Store Support Business.’ Currently, we are actively engaged in both of these ventures.
In our ‘Store Support Business,’ we develop and manage ‘kutikomi com,’ a platform adept at assimilating vast and intricate review-centric data. Through user-friendly software and AI-driven suggestions, we guide stores towards optimal actions, ultimately approaching shifts in consumer behavior. This significantly contributes to marketing strategies and operational enhancements within the store business.
Our honest consulting approach, coupled with top-tier products anchored by Ruby on Rails, has propelled us towards both steady and exponential growth.
We are hiring!
